actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill relating to the interest rates on loans made by the Treasury to the Department of Agriculture to carry out the program authorized by the Rural Electrification Act of 1936.

summary.text: Provides that the interest rate on loans made by the Treasury to the Department of Agriculture to carry out programs under the Rural Electrification Act shall not exceed the average rate of interest payable by the United States on its marketable obligations, expenses, and estimable losses.

titles.title: A bill relating to the interest rates on loans made by the Treasury to the Department of Agriculture to carry out the program authorized by the Rural Electrification Act of 1936.
